TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OptionTextAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OptionTextAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OptionTextAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: O compilador do Visual Basic emite a classe auxiliar para indicar (para depuração do Visual Basic) qual opção de comparação, binária ou de texto, está sendo usada

span.span: The Visual Basic compiler emits this helper class to indicate (for Visual Basic debugging) which comparison option, binary or text, is being used

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uso dessa classe é semelhante a especificar a opção de texto no [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).Use of this class is similar to specifying the text option in the [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uso dessa classe é semelhante a especificar a opção de texto no [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).Use of this class is similar to specifying the text option in the [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).
